profile.args: properties=x265-medium f=mp4 vcodec=libx265 acodec=aac crf=%quality ab=%audiobitrate+'k'
profile.name: MP4

profile.args: f=mp4 vcodec=hevc_nvenc rc:v=vbr_hq cq:v=19 b:v=%bitrate+'k' maxrate:v=%bitrate*2+'k' global_quality=19 acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k' preset=slow
profile.name: hevc_nvenc_VBR

profile.args: f=mp4 vcodec=h264_nvenc acodec=aac g=120 global_quality=19 ab=%audiobitrate+'k' vq=%quality preset=slow bf=2

profile.args: properties=x264-medium f=mp4 vcodec=libx264 acodec=aac g=120 crf=%quality ab=%audiobitrate+'k'
profile.name: MP4-H264

profile.args: f=mp4 c:v=libx264 preset=slow movflags=faststart bf=2 g=13 coder=1 pix_fmt=yuv420p profile:v=high crf=%quality c:a=aac profile:a aac_low b:a=%audiobitrate+'k'
profile.name: h264_crf_youtube
